modules.name: thought-action-audit-logger.ts
modules.category: LLM integration, thought processing, intent extraction, cognitive stream
modules.description: Implements detailed audit logging of the thought process in the cognition module. Tracks each stage from need identification to action completion in every session. Provides structured logs for debugging and analyzing the bot's decision pipeline.

modules.name: bot-state-cache.ts
modules.category: LLM integration, thought processing, intent extraction, cognitive stream
modules.description: state management module that maintains a versioned, time-stamped, and immutable currentState for the cognition layer, ensuring consistent access across all bot surface interactions without additional network calls.

modules.name: cognition-state.ts
modules.category: LLM integration, thought processing, intent extraction, cognitive stream
modules.description: Provides and manages the mutable state for cognitive operations in the conscious-bot LLM integration. Initializes key fields such as cognitiveThoughts, spawnPosition, and ttsEnabled via createInitialState. Ensures the state is safely passed and updated throughout the cognitive stream.

modules.name: chat-formatting.ts
modules.category: LLM integration, thought processing, intent extraction, cognitive stream
modules.description: Provides text cleanup functions for chat output formatting in the cognitive module of conscious-bot. Strips protocol markers and enforces character limits without semantic analysis. Normalizes whitespace and ensures responses comply with boundary rules for structured chat content.

modules.name: context-optimizer.ts
modules.category: LLM integration, thought processing, intent extraction, cognitive stream
modules.description: Implements context optimization by integrating and prioritizing memory retrieval, synthesizing relevant context across modules, and applying token and compression strategies to enhance LLM input context for efficient reasoning in the conscious-bot framework.

modules.name: conversation-manager.ts
modules.category: LLM integration, thought processing, intent extraction, cognitive stream
modules.description: * Conversation flow management system. * * Manages conversation state, topic tracking, and communication style * adaptation for natural and coherent social interactions. * * @author @darianrosebrook

modules.name: creative-solver.ts
modules.category: LLM integration, thought processing, intent extraction, cognitive stream
modules.description: Implements creative problem-solving with analogical reasoning, constraint relaxation, and solution generation using the LLM interface. Integrates domain knowledge and maintains a solution history for traceable, adaptive responses. Enables customizable configuration for controlling analogy use, relaxation depth, and solution diversity.

modules.name: emotional-memory-llm-adapter.ts
modules.category: LLM integration, thought processing, intent extraction, cognitive stream
modules.description: Contextualizes LLM responses with the bot's emotional memory and self-narrative, enhancing outputs by considering accumulated emotional experiences and identity-aware factors during reasoning. Integrates emotional state, recent experiences, and identity reinforcement into the cognitive stream. Allows controlled application of emotional focus via configuration.

modules.name: internal-dialogue.ts
modules.category: LLM integration, thought processing, intent extraction, cognitive stream
modules.description: Implements internal thought generation for consciousness-like self-reflection within the cognitive module of conscious-bot. Evaluates triggers and constructs a context-rich stream of InternalThought objects using the LLM interface. Maintains a bounded queue of thoughts and updates the cognitive state during processing.

modules.name: llm-interface.ts
modules.category: LLM integration, thought processing, intent extraction, cognitive stream
modules.description: with a clean text interface, provides safe text preprocessing to strip guillemets and prevent prompt injection attacks in the cognitive stream.

modules.name: llm-output-reducer.ts
modules.category: LLM integration, thought processing, intent extraction, cognitive stream
modules.description: Implements the LLM output reduction to assemble raw LLM responses into Sterling envelopes, ensuring strict adherence to the semantic boundary by mapping errors and attaching provenance before forwarding to downstream components.

modules.name: memory-aware-llm.ts
modules.category: LLM integration, thought processing, intent extraction, cognitive stream
modules.description: Provides a memory-aware LLM interaction layer that enables retrieval, storage, and recall of cognitive patterns during thought processing in the conscious-bot architecture.

modules.name: reflection-engine.ts
modules.category: LLM integration, thought processing, intent extraction, cognitive stream
modules.description: Analysis module within the cognitive architecture of conscious-bot, processes recent experiences to extract actionable insights and identify recurring patterns for intent refinement. Utilizes ExperienceAnalysis and Pattern detection to support continuous self-improvement and learning synthesis. Drives adaptive thought evolution by storing and evaluating reflection data in the cognitive stream.

modules.name: cognitive-metrics-tracker.ts
modules.category: LLM integration, thought processing, intent extraction, cognitive stream
modules.description: CognitiveMetricsTracker maintains and reports key performance metrics for the conscious-bot's cognitive processes. It tracks optimizations, conversations, solutions generated, violations blocked, and intrusions handled. The class provides counters, increments, and a reset method to monitor system efficiency.

modules.name: cognitive-state-tracker.ts
modules.category: LLM integration, thought processing, intent extraction, cognitive stream
modules.description: Implements conversation and operation logging in the cognitive-bot architecture. Maintains a set of active conversations and an array of recent operations with metrics such as cognitive load and attention level. Provides methods to start, end conversations and track system activity for audit and process monitoring.

modules.name: cognitive-stream-logger.ts
modules.category: LLM integration, thought processing, intent extraction, cognitive stream
modules.description: API logging service within the cognitive-bot package, forwards structured cognition events and metadata to the dashboard for real-time monitoring and analysis of the bot's thoughts and intent tracking.  Handles JSON payload formatting and integrates with the cognitive stream endpoint for secure, centralized logging.  Enables traceability of the cognitive process for debugging and safety evaluation.

modules.name: llm-token-config.ts
modules.category: LLM integration, thought processing, intent extraction, cognitive stream
modules.description: * Recommended maxTokens and temperature per LLM call source. * Tuned for latency vs quality: lower maxTokens = faster MLX responses. * * @author @darianrosebrook

modules.name: constitutional-filter.ts
modules.category: LLM integration, thought processing, intent extraction, cognitive stream
modules.description: Use LLM-generated proposals to evaluate actions, goals, and messages against constitutional rules via RulesEngine, returning compliance results and optional explanations. Implements strict, standard, and advisory enforcement levels with real-time monitoring for norm drift. Central to ethical decision-making in the cognitive stream.

modules.name: rules-database.ts
modules.category: LLM integration, thought processing, intent extraction, cognitive stream
modules.description: * Constitutional rules database. * * Manages the storage, retrieval, and versioning of constitutional rules * that govern agent behavior and decision-making. * * @author @darianrosebrook

modules.name: rules-engine.ts
modules.category: LLM integration, thought processing, intent extraction, cognitive stream
modules.description: rules engine evaluates user actions, goals, and messages against the conscious-bot's constitutional rules and conflict resolution strategies, ensuring ethical compliance and safety; it utilizes a RulesDatabase for rule retrieval and optionally an LLMInterface for advanced assessments; tracks reasoning traces and logging for auditability.

modules.name: types.ts
modules.category: LLM integration, thought processing, intent extraction, cognitive stream
modules.description: Provides type definitions for constitutional filtering rules used by the cognitive module in the conscious-bot framework for LLM command filtering and intent enforcement.

modules.name: observation-reasoner.ts
modules.category: LLM integration, thought processing, intent extraction, cognitive stream
modules.description: Implements a structured ObservationPayload type for the cognitive stream, integrating entity and event snapshots with spatial data for LLM input, Enables the LLM to process recent observations, optionally enriched with entity/event details,

modules.name: saliency-reasoner.ts
modules.category: LLM integration, thought processing, intent extraction, cognitive stream
modules.description: Provides saliency-based reasoning over entity tracks. Maintains a cognition-side view by applying and comparing saliency deltas with existing track summaries. Enables the cognitive module to reclassify or flag unknown entities while supporting awareness updates without LLM involvement.

modules.name: eval-orchestrator.ts
modules.category: LLM integration, thought processing, intent extraction, cognitive stream
modules.description: EvalOrchestrator in the cognition module orchestrates LLM-based eval runs by initializing the reasoning surface and emitting structured event payloads to track evaluation progress and results. It configures each eval session with the current state and invokes the production LF-4 code for scoring and summary extraction. The orchestrator compiles input scenarios and aggregates evaluation outputs into results bundles for downstream analysis.

modules.name: event-emitter.ts
modules.category: LLM integration, thought processing, intent extraction, cognitive stream
modules.description: Provides a TypeScript event emitter for the cognition module, logging eval run lifecycle events to events.jsonl according to the official conscious-bot schema. Ensures centralized and authoritative tracking of evaluation processes for consistency and auditability.

modules.name: frame-profiles.ts
modules.category: LLM integration, thought processing, intent extraction, cognitive stream
modules.description: Provides predefined frame profile configurations for the cognition module.

modules.name: metrics-collector.ts
modules.category: LLM integration, thought processing, intent extraction, cognitive stream
modules.description: Implements collects and aggregates per-scenario metrics for the cognition module's evaluation harness, tracking action_taken, grounding_pass, repetition, and anchoring_ratio for each evaluation run.

modules.name: result-bundle.ts
modules.category: LLM integration, thought processing, intent extraction, cognitive stream
modules.description: * Result Bundle for Eval Harness * * Creates content-addressed result bundles for eval runs. * Bundle IDs are deterministic based on content, not timestamps. * * @author @darianrosebrook

modules.name: sampler-profiles.ts
modules.category: LLM integration, thought processing, intent extraction, cognitive stream
modules.description: Provides predefined sampler profiles for the cognition module, allowing the LLM integration to select optimal generation parameters such as temperature, Top- P, and max tokens during intent extraction and cognitive stream processing.

modules.name: scenario-loader.ts
modules.category: LLM integration, thought processing, intent extraction, cognitive stream
modules.description: Implements scenario loading and validation for the cognition module, parsing and validating each line against an Ajv schema to ensure correct structure for the conscious-bot's intent extraction process.

modules.name: types.ts
modules.category: LLM integration, thought processing, intent extraction, cognitive stream
modules.description: Provides type definitions for evaluating the cognitive stimulus and action affordances within the conscious-bot's LLM integration layer. Defines enum and type structures for tracking event types, threat levels, and time of day states used in eval scenarios. Enables consistent, reusable types for the evaluation framework.

modules.name: event-driven-thought-generator.ts
modules.category: LLM integration, thought processing, intent extraction, cognitive stream
modules.description: Provides event-based triggers for the cognitive stream by analyzing BotLifecycleEvent context.

modules.name: intero-history.ts
modules.category: LLM integration, thought processing, intent extraction, cognitive stream
modules.description: Provides a ring buffer for timestamped intero snapshots used by the cognition module to persist and retrieve the bot's recent emotional and stress state changes.

modules.name: interoception-store.ts
modules.category: LLM integration, thought processing, intent extraction, cognitive stream
modules.description: Provides an in-memory store for the bot's interoceptive state, calculating a weighted composite stress score from six axes such as healthHunger, resource, and locationDistance, ensuring values remain clamped between 0 and 100. Manages current focus and curiosity levels for the cognitive stream. Supplies the computed stress and emotional state to higher-level reasoning in the cognition module.

modules.name: intrusion-interface.ts
modules.category: LLM integration, thought processing, intent extraction, cognitive stream
modules.description: input and validate external suggestions, parsing and classifying their content for risk assessment, then routing decisions through the cognitive pipeline for the conscious-bot's intrusion handling system.

modules.name: intrusion-parser.ts
modules.category: LLM integration, thought processing, intent extraction, cognitive stream
modules.description: Input and parses raw intrusion content into a structured format for the cognitive stream. Extracts intent, urgency, and context while applying configuration settings. Returns parsed result with confidence score and optional warnings for error handling.

modules.name: taxonomy-classifier.ts
modules.category: LLM integration, thought processing, intent extraction, cognitive stream
modules.description: classification results are retrieved or computed from intrusion content using LLM-based intent analysis and configured taxonomies, assigning risk levels and content types for filtering decisions. The class integrates LLM reasoning with static or dynamic taxonomies to evaluate and categorize incoming intrusion messages. Caching improves performance for recurring content types.

modules.name: types.ts
modules.category: LLM integration, thought processing, intent extraction, cognitive stream
modules.description: commented as types that structure external intrusion inputs for robust filtering, risk analysis, and decision making within the conscious-bot cognition module.

modules.name: intrusive-thought-processor.ts
modules.category: LLM integration, thought processing, intent extraction, cognitive stream
modules.description: Implements the conversion of intrusive thoughts into structured Task objects that the planning module uses to drive bot behavior, assigning actions, priorities, and confidence levels. Ensures each task retains a traceable thought origin and is formatted for the bot's decision-making pipeline. Facilitates the integration of user-generated intrusive thoughts into actionable plans with debug support.

modules.name: event-types.ts
modules.category: LLM integration, thought processing, intent extraction, cognitive stream
modules.description: Implements keep-alive event types for tracking system health and activity within the cognitive stream. Defines standardized payload schemas for tick, thought, and status events.

modules.name: idle-detector.ts
modules.category: LLM integration, thought processing, intent extraction, cognitive stream
modules.description: Implements idle detection for the keep-alive gate in the cognitive module of conscious-bot. Evaluates the current state to determine if the bot is idle by checking active plans, task conversions, threat level, and user command presence.

modules.name: intention-check-prompt.ts
modules.category: LLM integration, thought processing, intent extraction, cognitive stream
modules.description: a non-injective intention check prompt that presents the current situation without suggesting actions, prompting the model to optionally declare its intent using the [GOAL: <action> <target>] format when appropriate

modules.name: keep-alive-controller.ts
modules.category: LLM integration, thought processing, intent extraction, cognitive stream
modules.description: Provides an idle detection pathway for the cognition module to decide when the LF-4 reasoning surface should be prompted for new goals. Implements a strict invariant that never injects goals, only presents facts and waits for model initiative. Controls the flow by emitting KeepAliveEvents only when goals are present.

modules.name: envelope-builder.ts
modules.category: LLM integration, thought processing, intent extraction, cognitive stream
modules.description: context for constructing LanguageIOEnvelopeV1 from raw LLM output with optional metadata

modules.name: envelope-types.ts
modules.category: LLM integration, thought processing, intent extraction, cognitive stream
modules.description: Provides type definitions for SanitizationFlags used in the conscious-bot cognition module to track modifications applied to user input during text processing.

modules.name: execution-gate.ts
modules.category: LLM integration, thought processing, intent extraction, cognitive stream
modules.description: * Execution gate for task conversion. * * This module provides the SINGLE choke point for deciding if a * reducer result can be converted to a task. * * Key invariant: Uses is_executable ONLY, not advisory presence or confidence. * Advisory is for routing hints, NOT execution authority. * * @author @darianrosebrook

modules.name: marker-extractor.ts
modules.category: LLM integration, thought processing, intent extraction, cognitive stream
modules.description: Provides verbatim extraction of [GOAL:...] markers from text as part of the conscious-bot cognition module. Returns markers with exact spans and type. Does not interpret or normalize markers—raw extraction only.

modules.name: reducer-result-types.ts
modules.category: LLM integration, thought processing, intent extraction, cognitive stream
modules.description: Provides type-safety for committed goal, execution status, and optional advisory routing hints without exposing semantic details.

modules.name: sanitization-pipeline.ts
modules.category: LLM integration, thought processing, intent extraction, cognitive stream
modules.description: * Versioned sanitization pipeline for Language IO envelopes. * * This is a DETERMINISTIC, VERSIONED evidence transform - it produces * another observational surface, not canonical meaning. * * The sanitization pipeline removes LLM artifacts (code fences, degeneration, * etc.) while preserving the semantic content for Sterling to interpret.

modules.name: schema-compatibility.ts
modules.category: LLM integration, thought processing, intent extraction, cognitive stream
modules.description: * Schema version compatibility for Language IO boundary. * * TS must fail closed on unknown versions rather than * attempting "best effort" parsing. * * @author @darianrosebrook

modules.name: sterling-language-io-client.ts
modules.category: LLM integration, thought processing, intent extraction, cognitive stream
modules.description: required to convert LLM outputs into executable planning tasks via the LanguageIOEnvelope roundtrip interface

modules.name: transport.ts
modules.category: LLM integration, thought processing, intent extraction, cognitive stream
modules.description: Provides a WebSocket adapter for sending and receiving LanguageIO protocol messages between the cognition module and external LLM systems. Implements the LanguageIOReduceResponse interface to strictly forward data without semantic interpretation. Enables the cognition layer to decouple communication from actual LLM integration for flexible testing and mock scenarios.

modules.name: llm-output-sanitizer.ts
modules.category: LLM integration, thought processing, intent extraction, cognitive stream
modules.description: output sanitization transforms user LLM responses to deobfuscate and clean evidence before forwarding to Sterling for semantic analysis.

modules.name: ReActArbiter.ts
modules.category: LLM integration, thought processing, intent extraction, cognitive stream
modules.description: * ReAct Arbiter - Implements reason↔act loop for grounded cognition * * Orchestrates a ReAct loop that interleaves short reasoning with single tool calls; * selects goals, decides next option/skill, reads environment feedback, and iterates. * * @author @darianrosebrook

modules.name: eligibility.ts
modules.category: LLM integration, thought processing, intent extraction, cognitive stream
modules.description: only computes convertEligible using the current Sterling reduction provenance and checks for grounding validity before returning eligibility status

modules.name: frame-renderer.ts
modules.category: LLM integration, thought processing, intent extraction, cognitive stream
modules.description: Provides a structured rendering of the current situation frame for the cognition module, filtering out any goals or actions.

modules.name: grounder.ts
modules.category: LLM integration, thought processing, intent extraction, cognitive stream
modules.description: * Goal Grounder — Sterling-Owned Semantic Boundary * * MIGRATION (PR4): Grounding is now Sterling-owned.

modules.name: cognitive-stream-routes.ts
modules.category: LLM integration, thought processing, intent extraction, cognitive stream
modules.description: * Cognitive stream routes: lifecycle events, thought acking, task review, * recent thoughts, mark processed, and SSE streaming. * * Supports eval isolation via evalRunId filtering (AC-ISO-01, AC-ISO-02, AC-ISO-03).

modules.name: process-routes.ts
modules.category: LLM integration, thought processing, intent extraction, cognitive stream
modules.description: Provides the /process endpoint for the conscious-bot cognition module, handling intrusion detection and route-specific payloads for environmental_awareness, social_interaction, and external_chat. Implements filtering to prevent setting convertEligible: true in route handlers, ensuring safe operation. Enforces LF-2 conformance by delegating eligibility decisions to the thought-generation pipeline.

modules.name: reasoning-routes.ts
modules.category: LLM integration, thought processing, intent extraction, cognitive stream
modules.description: Input context is parsed and processed by the ReActArbiter to generate a reasoning step, which is returned to the client alongside the current state and timestamp. Handles ReAct-style interaction, extracting intent from inputs and integrating tools like inventory and goal stack manipulation. Provides robust error handling and clear JSON responses for step execution in the cognitive stream.

modules.name: reflection-generation-contract.ts
modules.category: LLM integration, thought processing, intent extraction, cognitive stream
modules.description: , the reflection generation contract defines the interface for capturing and processing player reflections via LLM integration in the cognition module, ensuring deterministic keys and structure while delegating text generation to the LLM and persisting results through the memory module.

modules.name: social-memory-routes.ts
modules.category: LLM integration, thought processing, intent extraction, cognitive stream
modules.description: * Social memory routes: entity retrieval, search, stats, fact recording.

modules.name: social-routes.ts
modules.category: LLM integration, thought processing, intent extraction, cognitive stream
modules.description: * Social routes: social consideration, nearby entities, chat consideration, * departure communication, social cognition processing.

modules.name: system-routes.ts
modules.category: LLM integration, thought processing, intent extraction, cognitive stream
modules.description: Provides system-level control for thought generation in the conscious-bot cognition module. Implements start, stop, and readiness status endpoints for controlling LLM-based intent extraction and cognitive stream initialization. Exposes REST routes to safely enable/disable text-to-speech and check operational status.

modules.name: telemetry-routes.ts
modules.category: LLM integration, thought processing, intent extraction, cognitive stream
modules.description: Provides telemetry-related endpoints for the cognitive module, enabling monitoring of system stress, spawn position, and network activity for the conscious-bot's thought processes.

modules.name: thought-routes.ts
modules.category: LLM integration, thought processing, intent extraction, cognitive stream
modules.description: Provides endpoints for retrieving the bot's recent thoughts via the cognitive stream, using a filtered and sorted list of thoughts from internal and external sources, and returns paginated results with timestamp metadata.

modules.name: advanced-identity-analyzer.ts
modules.category: LLM integration, thought processing, intent extraction, cognitive stream
modules.description: * Advanced identity analysis and evolution tracking. * * Provides sophisticated personality trait analysis, value system * tracking, and identity evolution monitoring for deep self-understanding. * * @author @darianrosebrook

modules.name: contract-system.ts
modules.category: LLM integration, thought processing, intent extraction, cognitive stream
modules.description: Implements contract-based tracking of commitments and promises within the cognitive architecture. Maintains commitment and promise state using structured contracts and enforces integrity assessment with TrustScore calculation. Provides integrity monitoring and accountability reporting for the conscious-bot's thought process.

modules.name: identity-tracker.ts
modules.category: LLM integration, thought processing, intent extraction, cognitive stream
modules.description: Implements identity aspects for tracking and updating the agent's core traits, values, and capabilities during cognitive operations. Manages a list of personality traits such as Curious, Careful, Helpful, and Persistent. Provides methods to reinforce identity components and log changes to the self-model.

modules.name: narrative-intelligence.ts
modules.category: LLM integration, thought processing, intent extraction, cognitive stream
modules.description: Implements narrative synthesis, experience-to-narrative integration, and thematic coherence tracking to support the cognitive stream of the conscious-bot. Utilizes StorySynthesis, ExperienceIntegration, and NarrativeCoherence components. Maintains logical consistency and generates rich internal self-narrative models.

modules.name: narrative-manager.ts
modules.category: LLM integration, thought processing, intent extraction, cognitive stream
modules.description: Implements narrative integration of new experiences into the conscious-bot's identity. Maintains and updates the agent's life story by adding Experience objects as new NarrativeChapters. Ensures coherent self-narrative by tracking significance and contextual links to existing stories.

modules.name: types.ts
modules.category: LLM integration, thought processing, intent extraction, cognitive stream
modules.description: Provides type definitions for identity, personality traits, and core values used by the self-model in the cognitive architecture of the conscious-bot. Defines structured models for trait consistency, value conflicts, and version tracking within the bot's reasoning process. Supports robust, typed representation necessary for accurate intent extraction and self-aware planning.

modules.name: cognitive-load-calculators.ts
modules.category: LLM integration, thought processing, intent extraction, cognitive stream
modules.description: Implements creativity metric calculation by assessing system capacity and recent uptime, penalizing high memory usage over time, and normalizing the result to a 0–1 creativity score for the cognitive stream.

modules.name: constants.ts
modules.category: LLM integration, thought processing, intent extraction, cognitive stream
modules.description: Tries to standardize and sanitize text inputs for the LLM integration in conscious-bot's cognition module, filtering out status-like or tag-containing content from being processed as spoken thoughts. Exposes TypeScript utility constants to enforce consistent formatting and prevent miscommunication in intent extraction. Ensures only relevant cognitive content reaches the thought generation pipeline without contamination.

modules.name: observation-helpers.ts
modules.category: LLM integration, thought processing, intent extraction, cognitive stream
modules.description: Provides utility functions for constructing and sanitizing observation payloads for the cognitive module of conscious-bot. Implements position redaction and numerical coercion to protect sensitive spatial data during LLM processing.

modules.name: server-logger.ts
modules.category: LLM integration, thought processing, intent extraction, cognitive stream
modules.description: Provides a tiered logging system for the cognition module, categorizing routine, lifecycle, research, and error events with color and context for the conscious-bot LLM integration. Implements automatic suppression of routine logs by default unless verbose mode is enabled. Ensures all critical and error events are always logged for traceability and debugging.

modules.name: step-generation-helpers.ts
modules.category: LLM integration, thought processing, intent extraction, cognitive stream
modules.description: * Step generation helpers: LLM-based task step generation with * intelligent fallback by task type.

modules.name: thought-stream-helpers.ts
modules.category: LLM integration, thought processing, intent extraction, cognitive stream
modules.description: Provides utility functions to send thoughts to the cognitive stream and execute the intrusion consideration step before passing messages to the LLM.

modules.name: tts-usable-content.ts
modules.category: LLM integration, thought processing, intent extraction, cognitive stream
modules.description: Provides a temporary wrapper for detecting code-like content in the cognitive module, replicating logic from llm-output-sanitizer. Implements isCodeLike and hasCodeLikeDensity for filtering TTS output. Ensures operational parity during the migration of the conscious-bot architecture.

modules.name: server.ts
modules.category: LLM integration, thought processing, intent extraction, cognitive stream
modules.description: Provides LLM-driven thought processing for the conscious-bot's cognitive stream. Creates and manages services for intent extraction via the LLMInterface. Orchestrates event-driven reasoning with EnhancedThoughtGenerator and integrates state using botStateCache and world state utilities.

modules.name: social-awareness-manager.ts
modules.category: LLM integration, thought processing, intent extraction, cognitive stream
modules.description: Implements social interaction decision-making for the bot. Analyzes nearby entities and chat messages to determine if the bot should acknowledge or respond. Uses context, relationships, and user priority to guide appropriate cognitive responses.

modules.name: agent-modeler.ts
modules.category: LLM integration, thought processing, intent extraction, cognitive stream
modules.description: Implements agent modeling by analyzing observations and extracting capabilities, personality, and behavioral patterns from other agents. Maintains up-to-date models using real-time interaction logs and adaptive inference algorithms. Triggers model updates when confidence thresholds for capabilities or behavior are exceeded.

modules.name: relationship-manager.ts
modules.category: LLM integration, thought processing, intent extraction, cognitive stream
modules.description: * Relationship Manager * * Tracks and manages social relationships and bonds over time. * Provides capabilities for trust calculation, bond tracking, and relationship quality assessment. * * @author @darianrosebrook

modules.name: social-learner.ts
modules.category: LLM integration, thought processing, intent extraction, cognitive stream
modules.description: Provides a social learning mechanism for the conscious-bot to infer and adapt strategies from agent interactions. Implements observation of behavior sequences and extraction of success indicators and learning opportunities. Enables the cognition module to store and utilize learned strategies for improved in-game decision-making.

modules.name: theory-of-mind-engine.ts
modules.category: LLM integration, thought processing, intent extraction, cognitive stream
modules.description: Implements structured interpretation of LLM outputs for social cognition, extracting beliefs, intentions, and behaviors from agent interactions. Provides parsing of LLM responses to extract actionable intentions and mental state inferences.

modules.name: types.ts
modules.category: LLM integration, thought processing, intent extraction, cognitive stream
modules.description: agent modeling types for the social cognition module in conscious-bot, defining structures for representing agents, their relationships, and inferred mental states during social interaction processing.

modules.name: stress-axis-computer.ts
modules.category: LLM integration, thought processing, intent extraction, cognitive stream
modules.description: Provides real-time Minecraft world state to compute axis scores (0-100) representing safety, resources, and progress for the cognitive stream. Implements individual axis calculations such as time since events and applies smoothing via blending. Supplies normalized axes to the context builder for LLM prompt generation.

modules.name: stress-boundary-logger.ts
modules.category: LLM integration, thought processing, intent extraction, cognitive stream
modules.description: event handler for logging decision boundary stress metrics, including intero state and axis vectors; records entries as JSON lines in the stress log for analysis; integrates with observation, intrusion, and task selection events within the cognition module.

modules.name: thought-generator.ts
modules.category: LLM integration, thought processing, intent extraction, cognitive stream
modules.description:
from packages.cognition.src import LLMInterface, computeEligibility  
 * Implements a deduplicator to prevent redundant thoughts during the cognitive stream generation.  
 * Uses LLMInterface and ReductionProvenance from reasoning-surface to ensure context-aware thought filtering.  
 * Maintains state to enhance the bot's reasoning efficiency and prevent loops.

modules.name: types.ts
modules.category: LLM integration, thought processing, intent extraction, cognitive stream
modules.description: to define the interface for interacting with an LLM provider used by the conscious-bot cognition module for sending prompts and receiving responses

modules.description: the vitest module provides configuration for unit and integration tests in the cognition package of conscious-bot, enabling robust evaluation of LLM-driven thought processing and intent extraction through structured test setup and mocks.

modules.name: advanced-need-generator.ts
modules.category: Shared utilities, TTS, API clients, base types
modules.description: Provides context-aware need generation for the conscious-bot’s planning system. Implements dynamic need evaluation using current context and memory signals.

modules.name: advanced-signal-processor.ts

modules.description: , implements advanced signal fusion and real-time processing pipelines for the conscious-bot's core systems, using Signal, FusedSignal, and SignalData types to integrate, analyze, and prioritize incoming data streams.

modules.name: arbiter.ts
modules.category: Shared utilities, TTS, API clients, base types
modules.description: Contextualizes and validates all incoming signals and task executions for the conscious-bot, ensuring compliance with safety, performance, and routing requirements. Central coordinator that routes cognitive tasks between modules using prioritization and trend analysis. Maintains system integrity through event-driven architecture and failure detection mechanisms.

modules.name: cognitive-stream-integration.ts
modules.category: Shared utilities, TTS, API clients, base types
modules.description: Provides seamless integration with MCP capabilities and planning modules for dynamic decision-making.

modules.name: debug-floor-check.ts
modules.category: Shared utilities, TTS, API clients, base types
modules.description: Provides the debug floor check functionality for the conscious-bot agent. Evaluates the current block the bot is standing on using the bot entity position. Logs position data and detects failures in the floor check by analyzing the underlying Minecraft block.

modules.name: demo-cognitive-stream.ts

Provides a clear integration demo for testing the bot's decision pipeline.

modules.name: demo-full-system-capabilities.ts

modules.name: demo-real-bot-integration.ts

modules.name: demo-working-capabilities.ts

modules.description: Provides a functional demo of the cognitive integration within the conscious-bot system, initializing a real Minecraft bot and logging operational states to verify core capabilities work end-to-end.

modules.name: fix-action-aborts.ts
modules.category: Shared utilities, TTS, API clients, base types
modules.description: Provides enhanced action abort handling for the conscious-bot's Minecraft agent by simulating timeout and argument issues in its execution flow. Implements custom error and spawn event hooks to validate the fixes before proceeding. Ensures robust testing of the planning and interaction modules against known abort scenarios.

modules.name: goal-template-manager.ts
modules.category: Shared utilities, TTS, API clients, base types

modules.name: crafting-leaves.ts

modules.description: Provides leaf crafting logic for the conscious-bot, including recipe validation and inventory updates via LeafImpl interface and error handling via LeafResult. Implements core crafting operations such as crafting and smelting using Bot and Vec3 utilities. Ensures safe execution by checking for timeouts and abort signals.

Exposes a LoggingConfig interface and a getLoggingConfig function to retrieve debug flags from environment variables. Enables consistent debug output for key subsystems such as environment, live stream, and actions when enabled.

modules.name: bt-dsl-parser.ts
modules.category: Shared utilities, TTS, API clients, base types
modules.description: Provides a TypeScript parser and compiler for the BT-DSL, translating declarative behavior into executable CompiledBTNode instances and enabling deterministic node execution. Implements schema validation using Ajv to ensure correct BT-DSL syntax before compilation. Enforces contract-based node execution with promised BTResult return and error handling.

modules.name: bt-dsl-schema.ts
modules.category: Shared utilities, TTS, API clients, base types
modules.description: Provides a RepeatUntil node for iterative behavior in the BT-DSL, requiring a condition to succeed; enforces strict node typing hierarchy for behavior tree composition in the conscious-bot architecture.

modules.name: capability-registry.ts

modules.name: capability-specs.ts

modules.description: Provides structured validation for Minecraft capability requests by enforcing agent health and position constraints during execution context checks.

Implements rule evaluation by checking capability requests against defined ethical and safety constraints in context. Flags violations with detailed severity and suggested actions for automated or human review.

modules.name: dynamic-creation-flow.ts

modules.description: * Rate Limiter - Prevents capability abuse through sophisticated rate limiting * * Implements sliding window rate limiting with burst allowance, adaptive limits, * and capability-specific controls to prevent abuse while allowing legitimate usage. * * @author @darianrosebrook

modules.name: registry.ts
modules.category: Shared utilities, TTS, API clients, base types
modules.description: registry module provides type definitions and metadata management for leaves and options within the conscious-bot system, enforcing separate registration paths for human-signed and LLM-authored entries while tracking provenance, permissions, and runtime quotas.

modules.name: task-timeframe-management.ts
modules.category: Shared utilities, TTS, API clients, base types
modules.description: Implements configurable time buckets for the conscious-bot's task execution timelines. Provides 'tactical', 'short', 'standard', 'long', and 'expedition' buckets with duration caps and priority. Enables explainable bucket selection and supports pause/resume and checkpoint mechanisms.

modules.name: minecraft-cognitive-integration.ts
modules.category: Shared utilities, TTS, API clients, base types
modules.description: real-time bridges the cognitiveStream with Mineflayer bot, translating thoughts and decisions into Minecraft actions through method calls like MoveToLeaf and PlaceBlockLeaf. Enables safe, timed execution of user intents via the configured action methods and emits progress events to the main cognitive module. Ensures only authorized actions are taken by checking the bot connection status and forwarding cognitive events to the Minecraft environment.

modules.name: mock-bot-service.ts
modules.category: Shared utilities, TTS, API clients, base types
modules.description: Provides mock connectivity for the planning module during evaluation. Simulates bot state, including position, inventory, and health. Allows the core system to test task execution in isolation.

modules.name: performance-monitor.ts
modules.category: Shared utilities, TTS, API clients, base types

modules.name: priority-ranker.ts
modules.category: Shared utilities, TTS, API clients, base types
modules.description: score and rank tasks using calculatedPriority, applying customizable boosts for commitment, novelty, and opportunity cost factors to determine the bot's next action.

modules.name: alerting-system.ts

modules.description: Provides real-time alert management for the conscious-bot's performance and system health metrics. Implements rule-based thresholds and escalation policies, emits events via custom EventEmitter to notify the dashboard and external channels. Central for triggering alerts when performance context exceeds defined limits and for handling notification delivery configurations.

modules.name: budget-enforcer.ts

modules.description: Contextualizes and enforces system performance budgets using the current SystemLoad, monitoring and adjusting allocations via the thought process

modules.name: degradation-manager.ts

modules.name: types.ts

modules.name: http-client.ts

modules.description: Client provides a robust HTTP request wrapper with built-in retry, circuit breaker, and timeout mechanisms to ensure safe and reliable communication for the conscious-bot system. modules.description: Provides a resilient HTTP client for hot-reloading-aware service calls in conscious-bot. Automatically retries on transient connection errors with exponential backoff and configurable options. Integrates with the bot's modular service components to ensure robust external API interactions.

Displays comprehensive bot status and evaluation metrics in a reactive Next.js/vite-based viewer HUD.

Displays current task performance, decision quality metrics, system health status, and a timeline of recent activity. Integrates with InteroTimelineChart, SparklineChart, and memory modules to fetch and visualize evaluation data.

modules.name: hud-meter.tsx
modules.category: Next.js dashboard, viewer HUD
modules.description: Provides styled components for easy integration into the viewer HUD.

modules.name: intero-current-snapshot.tsx
modules.category: Next.js dashboard, viewer HUD
modules.description: * Intero Current Snapshot * * Compact display of the current interoceptive state: * six horizontal bars (one per stress axis), three headline numbers * (composite stress, focus, curiosity), and an emotional state badge. * * @author @darianrosebrook

modules.name: intero-timeline-chart.tsx
modules.category: Next.js dashboard, viewer HUD
modules.description: Provides a multi-line SVG timeline for the conscious-bot dashboard. Implements axis coloring and dynamically renders stress metrics from InteroSnapshot data. Displays real-time stress values with grid lines and interactive hover tooltips for clear viewer HUD visualization.

modules.name: inventory-display.tsx
modules.category: Next.js dashboard, viewer HUD
modules.description: ;Provides a React component for rendering the conscious-bot's main inventory (slots 9–44) with item details and display logic. Implements display state, item rendering using sprites and metadata, and integrates with the ViewerHudOverlay for the hotbar (slots 0–8).

modules.name: pill.tsx
modules.category: Next.js dashboard, viewer HUD
modules.description:
,
The dashboard's Pill component renders labeled or tagged metadata as clickable visual indicators within the viewer HUD, supporting multiple variants for visual distinction. 
It is designed to cleanly display and highlight important information such as task sources or thought types. 
This component integrates seamlessly with the dashboard's tagging system to enhance user clarity.

modules.name: section.tsx
modules.category: Next.js dashboard, viewer HUD
modules.description: Implements a reusable section for organizing dashboard content in the conscious-bot dashboard Provides a structured layout with header and content wrappers Enforces consistent visual styling across all panel sections
